page.title: 13TRELLECH HOUSING.
page.content: AWAY FROM THE VILLAGE THERE IS A MIXTURE OF CO TTAGES AND FARM HOUSES: SOME ARE RENDERED, AND SOME HAVE EXTENSIONS. SOME ARE MADE OF STONE AND SOME ARE RENDERED AND PAINTED. IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE OLD HOUSES AND NEW HOUSES. THE OLD HOUSES ARE MOSTLY DETATCHED AND MADE OF STONE. THE NEW HOUSES ARE MOSTLY BUNGALOWS AND THEY ARE ON A NEW HOUSING ESTATE CALLED ROMAN WAY. IT HAS 20 HOUSES WHICH ARE SEMI-DETATCHED, AND ARE MADE OF BRICK. SOME ARE OLD PEOPLES BUNGALOWS. MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE HEATED BY GAS OR OIL OR COAL OR LOG FIRES. SOME WINDOWS HAVE DOUBLE GLAZING AND ONE HOUSE IN ROMAN WAY HAS A SOLAR PANEL, WHICH HEATS UP THE WATER.
